body:
* Add [d3.forceRadial](https://github.com/d3/d3-force/blob/master/README.md#forceRadial). Thanks, @nbremer!
* Add [*drag*.touchable](https://github.com/d3/d3-drag/blob/master/README.md#drag_touchable). Thanks, @nicolas-van!
* Add [*zoom*.touchable](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom/blob/master/README.md#zoom_touchable).
* Add [d3.geoNaturalEarth1](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoNaturalEarth1). Thanks, @Fil!
* Add [*projection*.preclip](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_preclip). Thanks, @Fil!
* Add [*projection*.postclip](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_postclip).
* Add [d3.geoClipAntimeridian](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoClipAntimeridian).
* Add [d3.geoClipCircle](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoClipCircle).
* Add [d3.geoClipRectangle](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoClipRectangle).
* Fix [d3.ticks](https://github.com/d3/d3-array/blob/master/README.md#ticks) when *start* is equal to *stop* and *count* is positive.
* Fix [d3.timer](https://github.com/d3/d3-timer) sleeping for too long when timer invocation is expensive.

* Fix DSV parsing when the last field is empty (e.g., `foo,bar,`).
* Replace the `browser` field in package.json with `unpkg` and `jsdeliver`. (#3138)
* Replace the `prepublish` script with `prepublishOnly`.
* Update dependencies.

* Add [d3.areaRadial](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#areaRadial); deprecate d3.radialArea.
* Add [d3.lineRadial](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#lineRadial); deprecate d3.radialLine.
* Add [d3.pointRadial](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#pointRadial).
* Add [*zoom*.translateTo](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom/blob/master/README.md#zoom_translateTo).
* Re-implement [d3.packEnclose](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#packEnclose) using [Matoušek-Sharir-Welzl](https://d3.express/@mbostock/miniball). Thanks, @robinhouston!
* Fix [d3.packSiblings](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#packSiblings) to center the circles more consistently around a fixed origin.
* Fix [axis rendering](https://github.com/d3/d3-axis) when a scale has a non-numeric range.
* Fix [*interval*.offset](https://github.com/d3/d3-time/blob/master/README.md#interval_offset) on [filtered time intervals](https://github.com/d3/d3-time/blob/master/README.md#interval_filter) when *step* is negative.
* Fix invocation of requestAnimationFrame in Edge. Thanks, @KonradKlimczak!
* Invoke [*nest*.sortValues](https://github.com/d3/d3-collection/blob/master/README.md#nest_sortValues) comparator prior to [*nest*.rollup](https://github.com/d3/d3-collection/blob/master/README.md#nest_rollup) aggregator.
* [Drag](https://github.com/d3/d3-drag) & [zoom](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom) behaviors now only register touch event listeners when touch is supported.
* [Drag](https://github.com/d3/d3-drag) & [zoom](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom) behaviors now set the touch-action style to “none” when touch is supported.

* Fix [d3.linkRadial](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#linkRadial) to use radians rather than degrees.
* Optimize [*path*.pointRadius](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#path_pointRadius) slightly.

* Change [*selection*.style](https://github.com/d3/d3-selection/blob/master/README.md#selection_style) to return the inline style, if present.
* Change [*transition*.style](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/blob/master/README.md#transition_style) to start from the inline style, if present.
* Add [link shapes](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#links)!
* Add [d3.stackOffsetDiverging](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#stackOffsetDiverging).
* Add [*random*.source](https://github.com/d3/d3-random/blob/master/README.md#random_source) to allow custom sources of randomness. Thanks, @rolyatmax!
* Add [*drag*.clickDistance](https://github.com/d3/d3-drag/blob/master/README.md#drag_clickDistance) for setting the click distance threshold. Thanks, @Epiphero!
* Add [*zoom*.clickDistance](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom/blob/master/README.md#zoom_clickDistance) for setting the click distance threshold.
* Add [d3.style](https://github.com/d3/d3-selection/blob/master/README.md#style).
* Fix rounding errors in [*continuous*.nice](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#continuous_nice).
* Fix inconsistency between [*continuous*.ticks](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#continuous_ticks) and [*continous*.nice](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#continuous_nice). Thanks, @danielyule!
* Fix [axis](https://github.com/d3/d3-axis) tick offset for band and point scales.
* Fix drag click suppression to ignore mousemove events that don’t actually move.
* Fix zoom click suppression to ignore mousemove events that don’t actually move.
* Fix error trying to [interpolate objects](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate/blob/master/README.md#interpolate) without prototypes. Thanks, @devgru!
* Optimize generated [axis](https://github.com/d3/d3-axis) DOM slightly.
* Improve error message descriptions in [d3.queue](https://github.com/d3/d3-queue). Thanks, @ethervoid!

* Add [d3.tickIncrement](https://github.com/d3/d3-array/blob/master/README.md#tickIncrement).
* Fix [d3.ticks](https://github.com/d3/d3-array/blob/master/README.md#ticks) to always return the most-precise representable values in IEEE 754!
* Fix [*histogram*.thresholds](https://github.com/d3/d3-array/blob/master/README.md#histogram_thresholds) to retain thresholds equal to the domain’s upper bound.
* [Number format locales](https://github.com/d3/d3-format) can now override the percent sign suffix. Thanks, @davinov!
* Fix primary touch location on secondary touchend when [zooming](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom).

* Fix the [Mercator projection](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoMercator)’s built-in clipping when [*projection*.rotate](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_center) is used.
* Fix the [transverse Mercator projection](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoMercator)’s built-in clipping when [*projection*.rotate](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_center) is used.
* Fix the [transverse Mercator projection](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoTransverseMercator)’s built-in clipping when [*projection*.clipExtent](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_clipExtent) is used.

* Optimize [d3.pack](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#pack).
* Fix string coercion in [*transition*.style](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/blob/master/README.md#transition_style) and [*transition*.attr](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/blob/master/README.md#transition_attr). Thanks, @sghall!
* Update dependencies.

- Fix the [Mercator projection](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoMercator)’s built-in clipping when [_projection_.center](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_center) is used.
- Fix the [Mercator projection](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoMercator)’s built-in clipping when [_projection_.clipExtent](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_clipExtent) is used.
- Ignore small-angle arcs in [_path_.arc](https://github.com/d3/d3-path/blob/master/README.md#path_arc) to workaround rendering bug in Chrome on Ubuntu.
- Fix escaping of strings containing carriage returns in [d3-dsv](https://github.com/d3/d3-dsv). Thanks, @jsedlacek!

- Add [d3.cross](https://github.com/d3/d3-array/blob/master/README.md#cross).
- Allow [d3.pairs](https://github.com/d3/d3-array/blob/master/README.md#pairs) to take an optional reducer.
- Add [d3.geoContains](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoContains). Thanks, @Fil!
- Fix invalid transforms when an ordinal [axis transition](https://github.com/d3/d3-axis) is interrupted. 
- [Localized number formats](https://github.com/d3/d3-format/blob/master/README.md#formatLocale) can now define [numeral systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Numeral_system), such as Hindu–Arabic.
- Fix [number formatting](https://github.com/d3/d3-format/blob/master/README.md#locale_format) of negative infinity.
- Maybe make [rounded arcs](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#arc_cornerRadius) a little more robust.
- Optimize [d3.geoCentroid](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoCentroid). Thanks, @Fil!

- Add [_path_.measure](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#path_measure).
- [Improve](https://twitter.com/mbostock/status/829117676773478403) [d3.pack](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#pack) layout.
- Fix [d3.geoBounds](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoBounds) for certain line geometries.
- Fix [d3.geoCentroid](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoCentroid) for detailed features. Thanks, @Fil!

- Add [_node_.count](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#node_count).
- Fix overlapping circles in [d3.pack](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#pack) and [d3.packSiblings](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#packSiblings).
- Fix calculation of clock skew when page is backgrounded before [timers](https://github.com/d3/d3-timer) are scheduled.
- Fix [d3.event](https://github.com/d3/d3-selection/blob/master/README.md#event) export on Node. (#3055)

- Fix [d3.interpolateRgb](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate/blob/master/README.md#interpolateRgb).[gamma](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate/blob/master/README.md#interpolate_gamma)’s opacity interpolation.

- Fix handling of [zoom](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom) gestures that start with multiple touches.
- Fix crash with coincident points in voronoi [_diagram_.find](https://github.com/d3/d3-voronoi/blob/master/README.md#diagram_find).
- Fix crash with coincident points in voronoi [_diagram_.triangles](https://github.com/d3/d3-voronoi/blob/master/README.md#diagram_triangles).

- Add [_identity_.reflectX](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#identity_reflectX) and [_identity_.reflectY](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#identity_reflectY) to [d3.geoIdentity](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoIdentity).
- Add [_zoom_.interpolate](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom/blob/master/README.md#zoom_interpolate) to control zoom transition behavior.
- Allow double-click and double-tap [zoom transitions](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom/blob/master/README.md#zoom_duration) to be disabled.
- Fix handling of a [zoom.translateExtent](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom/blob/master/README.md#zoom_translateExtent) smaller than the [zoom.extent](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom/blob/master/README.md#zoom_extent).
- Fix handling of zero-valued nodes in [squarified treemaps](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#treemapSquarify).
- Fix parsing of unusual number formats in [color specifications](https://github.com/d3/d3-color).
- Fix implementations of [_force_.initialize](https://github.com/d3/d3-force/blob/master/README.md#force_initialize) to allow [isolation](https://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/b1f0ee970299756bc12d60aedf53c13b).
- Fix [d3.geoPath](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoPath)’s default projection and contex to be null, not undefined.
- Improve performance of [d3.path](https://github.com/d3/d3-path).

- Add [_diagram_.find](https://github.com/d3/d3-voronoi/blob/master/README.md#diagram_find) for fast searching of Voronoi diagrams. Thanks, @Fil!
- Add [d3.geoIdentity](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoIdentity) for scaling, translating and clipping planar geometry.
- Add [d3.geoGraticule10](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoGraticule10) for conveniently generating a default 10° global graticule.
- Add optional arguments to [d3.geoPath](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoPath) for _projection_ and _context_.
- Deprecate d3.geoClipExtent; use [d3.geoIdentity](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoIdentity)’s [clipExtent](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_clipExtent) instead.
- Fix reporting of _interrupt_ transition events.

- Fix bug where calling [_collide_.radius](https://github.com/d3/d3-force/blob/master/README.md#collide_radius) had no effect.
- Improve error message when [_link_.links](https://github.com/d3/d3-force/blob/master/README.md#link_links) references unknown nodes.
- Fix [d3.geoConicConformal](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoConicConformal)’s [invert](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#projection_invert) for south-pointing cones.
- Fix [d3.geoConicEqualArea](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoConicEqualArea) when the cone is a cylinder.
- Fix hang in [_interval_.every(…).range](https://github.com/d3/d3-time/blob/master/README.md#interval_range) given invalid dates.
- Fix cache invalidation bug in [d3.geoAlbersUsa](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoAlbersUsa).
- Fix a crash if brush selection is cleared via [_brush_.move](https://github.com/d3/d3-brush/blob/master/README.md#brush_move) during a gesture.

- Chained [transitions](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition) no longer sometimes interrupt their preceding transition.
- [Transitions](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition) no longer get stuck if an error is thrown on the last tick.
- [Transitions](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition) no longer leak memory if an error is thrown.
- Optimize [d3.geoPath](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoPath).
- Fix swallowed error in [d3.queue](https://github.com/d3/d3-queue)’s await callback after a synchronous task.
- Fix benign bug in [d3.curveCatmullRom](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#curveCatmullRom).
- Fix for invalid _timestamp_ argument in requestAnimationFrame in RStudio.
- Update Rollup.
- Fix [d3.geoStereographic](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo/blob/master/README.md#geoStereographic)’s invert.

- All modules now expose a `module` entry point (rollup/rollup-plugin-node-resolve#48).
- Fix crash in [d3.geoBounds](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo#geoBounds).
- Add [_projection_.fitExtent](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo#projection_fitExtent) and [_projection_.fitSize](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo#projection_fitSize). Thanks, @veltman!

- Better defaults for [map projections](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo#projections).
- Fix crash when [d3.zoom](https://github.com/d3/d3-zoom) is simultaneously applied to an element and its ancestor.
- Throw an error if a [d3.request](https://github.com/d3/d3-reqest) callback is invalid.
- Deprecate the optional _step_ argument to [_time_.ticks](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale#time_ticks); use [_interval_.every](https://github.com/d3/d3-time#interval_every) instead.
- Fix [_voronoi_.size](https://github.com/d3/d3-voronoi#voronoi_size) when the minimum values of the extent are non-zero.

- Export [raw geographic projections](https://github.com/d3/d3-geo#raw-projections).
- Add [d3.interpolateDate](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate#interpolateDate).
- Change [d3.interpolate](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate#interpolate) to special-case dates.
- Change [d3.interpolate](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate#interpolate) to special-case number-like objects.
- Include [d3-chord](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/API.md#chords-d3-chord).
- Fix for missing [performance.now](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Performance/now) in IE9.

D3 is now modular, composed of many small libraries that you can also use independently. Each library has its own repo and release cycle for faster development. The modular approach also improves the process for custom bundles and plugins.

There are a lot of improvements in 4.0: there were about as many commits in 4.0 as in _all prior versions_ of D3. Some changes make D3 easier to learn and use, such as immutable selections. But there are lots of new features, too! These are covered in detail in the [release notes](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md); here are a few highlights.

### [Colors](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#colors-d3-color), [Interpolators](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#interpolators-d3-interpolate) and [Scales](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#scales-d3-scale)
- [Colors](https://github.com/d3/d3-color/blob/master/README.md#color) now have opacity (rgba, hsla, etc.).
- New [Cubehelix color space](https://github.com/d3/d3-color/blob/master/README.md#cubehelix).
- New [sequential color scales](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#sequential-scales), including [Viridis](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#interpolateViridis) and [cyclical Rainbow](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#interpolateRainbow).
- New [point](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#point-scales) and [band](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale/blob/master/README.md#band-scales) scales replace _ordinal_.rangeBands and _ordinal_.rangePoints.
- New [basis spline interpolators](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate/blob/master/README.md#splines) (_e.g._, [continuous ColorBrewer schemes](https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)).

### [Shapes](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#shapes-d3-shape) and [Layouts](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#hierarchies-d3-hierarchy)
- Shapes (_e.g._, [lines](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#lines), [areas](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#areas), [arcs](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#arcs)) can now render to Canvas.
- Fixed [cardinal](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#curveCardinal) and [monotone](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#curveMonotoneX) splines.
- Added [parameterized Catmull–Rom](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#curveCatmullRom) and [natural](https://github.com/d3/d3-shape/blob/master/README.md#curveNatural) splines.
- New deterministic, extensible [velocity Verlet force layout](https://github.com/d3/d3-force/blob/master/README.md).
- New [circle-packing layout](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#pack)!
- New extensible [treemap layout](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#treemap); improved [squarified treemaps](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#treemapSquarify); added [binary treemaps](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#treemapBinary).
- New [d3.stratify](https://github.com/d3/d3-hierarchy/blob/master/README.md#stratify) for tabular hierarchical data.
- New faster, mutable, non-recursive [quadtrees](https://github.com/d3/d3-quadtree/blob/master/README.md).
- [Voronoi diagrams](https://github.com/d3/d3-voronoi/blob/master/README.md) now expose topological information.

### [Selections](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#selections-d3-selection), [Transitions](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#transitions-d3-transition), [Easings](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#easings-d3-ease) and [Timers](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md#timers-d3-timer)
- [Selections](https://github.com/d3/d3-selection/blob/master/README.md) and [transitions](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/blob/master/README.md) are now immutable, providing a cleaner interface.
- New [_selection_.raise](https://github.com/d3/d3-selection/blob/master/README.md#selection_raise), [_selection_.lower](https://github.com/d3/d3-selection/blob/master/README.md#selection_lower) and [_selection_.dispatch](https://github.com/d3/d3-selection/blob/master/README.md#selection_dispatch) methods.
- [Time](https://github.com/d3/d3-timer/blob/master/README.md) is now frozen in the background, avoiding unintended effort.
- Timers can now be [stopped](https://github.com/d3/d3-timer/blob/master/README.md#timer_stop) externally.
- Transitions can now interpolate [CSS transforms](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate/blob/master/README.md#interpolateTransformCss) (in addition to [SVG transforms](https://github.com/d3/d3-interpolate/blob/master/README.md#interpolateTransformSvg)).
- You can now cancel transitions using [_selection_.interrupt](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/blob/master/README.md#selection_interrupt).
- Easier transition chaining thanks to new [d3.active](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/blob/master/README.md#active) and changed [_transition_.delay](https://github.com/d3/d3-transition/blob/master/README.md#transition_delay).
- Better performance for homogenous transitions (_e.g._, shared interpolators across elements).
- Better state persistence and enforcement for transitions.
- Fixed [elastic](https://github.com/d3/d3-ease/blob/master/README.md#easeElastic) and [bounce](https://github.com/d3/d3-ease/blob/master/README.md#easeBounce) easing.

### [Even More!](https://github.com/d3/d3/blob/master/CHANGES.md)
- Better default [axis](https://github.com/d3/d3-axis/blob/master/README.md) appearance.
- Better [brush](https://github.com/d3/d3-brush/blob/master/README.md) interaction.
- Built-in [asynchronous queue](https://github.com/d3/d3-queue/blob/master/README.md) for loading files in parallel.
- New low-level [d3.ticks](https://github.com/d3/d3-array/blob/master/README.md#ticks) API.
- More robust treatment of degenerate, almost-empty polygons in d3.geo.path (#2025).
- Fix implicit namespaces in non-HTML documents (#2737).
- Fix d3.behavior.drag when using svg:use elements in some browsers (#2548).
- Fix case-sensitivity of [_selection_.append](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#append) in case-insensitive documents (#2722).
- Fix Browserify support (#2708).

- Fix [_scale_.nice](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#linear_nice) to guarantee consistency with  [_scale_.ticks](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#linear_ticks) (d3/d3-scale#9).

- More precise filtering of log ticks (#2677).
- More precise calculation of chord group sums (#2675).
- Fix reported end event when force layout is stopped manually (#2654).

- Fix priority inversion for transitions scheduled during a start event (d3/d3-transition#16).
- Fix over-zealous click canceling on drag (#2616).
- Workaround r.js bug (#2617).
- Fix conditional function declaration in selection.transition (#2613).

- Fix selection.attr when using the special XMLNS namespace (#1935).
- Fix selection.data when an element is null and a key function is specified (#2598).
- Fix transitions so that pre-emption frees resources now, not later (#2600 #2189).
- Fix transition.remove so that it runs even if another transition was pre-empted (#2377).
- Fix d3.selectAll so that it can select an HTMLCollection or other array-like object (#2376).
- Fix d3.svg.arc when rendering very large or very small rounded arcs (#2183 #2249).
- Fix d3.svg.axis ticks so that it returns an array, not arguments (#2430).
- Fix d3.svg.line and d3.svg.area’s rendering of single-point segments (#2061).
- Fix d3.layout.pie when all values are zero (#2420).
- Fix d3.layout.treemap when all values are zero (#2419).
- Fix d3.layout.force when a link’s source and target both have zero weight (#2091).
- Fix d3.layout.force from starting multiple timers (#2468).
- Fix d3.interpolateZoom when u0 ≅ u1 (#2575).
- Fix d3.interpolateTransform so that multiple transforms are comma-separated (#2541).
- Fix d3.formatPrefix when specified value is not a number (#2595).
- Fix d3.time.format parsing of week-of-year (%U and %W) without day-of-week (#1914).
- Fix d3.behavior.zoom so that a programmatically-set scale is appropriately clamped (#2128).
- Simplify package.json definition for CommonJS.

- Fix d3.interpolate to detect mixed- and upper-case colors such as `"DarkOrange"`.
- Fix d3.behavior.zoom’s handling of mousewheel during a zoom gesture.
- Fix `d3.select(document)` and `d3.select({})`.

- Zero dependencies! JSDOM is now limited to a development dependency for testing.
- Remove runtime dependency on global `window` and `document`.
- Fix `d3.transition()` crash in IE.
- Fix selection.append for shadow DOMs that lack a namespaceURI.
- Fix quadtree.find when used with x- and y-accessors.
- Fix parsing of named colors to be case-insensitive.
- Add support for the color “rebeccapurple”.
- Improve initial random positioning of nodes for force layouts.
- Fix selection.interrupt when interrupting the last scheduled transition.

- Fix `d3.transition(name)`.
- Include d3.variance and d3.deviation in the default build.

- Fix selection.interrupt to prevent erroneous cancelation of scheduled transitions.
- Fix transition event listeners to see the latest data.
- d3.transition now takes an optional name argument.
- Dispatch interrupt events immediately within the call to selection.interrupt.
- Dispatch interrupt events prior to start events on the interrupting transition.
- Do not dispatch erroneous interrupt events on cancelled transitions.
- Do not allow exceptions within a transition.each callback to prevent future transitions.

name: 3.5 “Mount Sharp”
body:
- Add named transitions (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/5d8039fb983a29e2ad49) [2](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/24bdd02df2a72866b0ec)) for concurrent animations on the same element.
- Add “interrupt” events for handling interrupted transitions.
- Add d3.layout.pie padAngle (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/f098d146315be4d1db52) [2](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/31ec1817b2be2660c453) [3](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/32bd93b1cc0fbccc9bf9)), which preserves approximate relative area of arcs.
- Add d3.svg.arc cornerRadius (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/aff9e559c5c9968b7ac6) [2](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/f8f88029f3a5fde00407) [3](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/b7671cb38efdfa5da3af) [4](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/c501f6cae402ab5e90c9)) for arcs with rounded corners.
- Add double-click and double-tap [smooth transitions](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/3892919) to d3.behavior.zoom.
- Add d3.behavior.zoom duration for customizing or disabling double-click transitions.
- Add d3.map(array, accessor) for constructing a map by key from an array.
- Add d3.scale.ordinal rangeRoundPoints, a rounded version of rangePoints.
- Add d3.geom.quadtree find for efficient [2D search](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/9078690).
- Add d3.variance and d3.deviation.
- Add locales for Poland and Canada.
- Add d3.shuffle(array, lo, hi) for shuffling a subset of an array.
- d3.svg.arc now generates a [counterclockwise arc](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/57d620285395dae5a2ff) when startAngle is greater than endAngle.
- Allow a transition’s ease or duration to be changed before the transition starts.
- Fix spurious stroke when rendering Point features on canvas with d3.geo.path.
- Fix memory leak with chained transitions.
- Fix reported "zoomstart" and "zoomend" events for re-entrant zoom gestures.

- Fix [invalid transform](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/1968) when switching between linear and log axes.
- Fix [number](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/1994) [formatting](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/1972) of groups with very small or very large numbers in exponent notation.
- Fix [number formatting](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/2072) with explicit minus (“-”) sign.
- Fix [loss of precision](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/2039) during linear interpolation.
- Fix [crash](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/2004) in d3.layout.stack when passed an empty array.
- Fix for [falsey rows](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/2010) when parsing DSV.
- Fix for leaked [d3 global](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/2006) in Node.
- Fix conversion from [HCL to Lab](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/pull/2063) color.
- Fix for [d3.mean](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/2067), [d3.median](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/issues/2069) and [d3.scale.quantile](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/pull/2068) to coerce values to numbers.
- Improve performance of d3.map and d3.set by using `Object.create(null)`.
- Improve performance of selection.data.

- Fix uncaught InvalidStateError thrown when using [d3.xhr](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Requests) with non-text response types.
- Fix [parsing](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Formatting#parse) of positive time zone offsets with a non-zero number of minutes.
- Update to [JSDOM](https://github.com/tmpvar/jsdom) version 1.0.0.
- Fix [selection.size](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#size) on [enter selections](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#enter).
- Workaround a Chrome [touch bug](https://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=412723) affecting [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior).
- Fix the reported center of the [transverse Mercator](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#transverseMercator) projection.

- Expose the `d3` global, even on pages with an AMD loader. This is primarily for the benefit of libraries and plugins that depend on the `d3` global but that do not support AMD. However, it also has the benefit that you can use D3 from the developer console even on pages that use AMD.
- Fix the zoom focus on [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) on the start of a mousewheel zoom gesture, rather than continuously, to avoid unintended panning during zoom.

- Using instanceof with [d3.rgb](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#d3_rgb), [d3.hsl](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#d3_hsl), [d3.lab](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#d3_lab) and [d3.hcl](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#d3_hcl) now works as expected.
- Expose [d3.color](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#d3_color) to allow subclassing of colors with automatic [RGB interpolation](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#d3_interpolate).
- Prefer [element.matches](http://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-element-matches) when available for [selection.filter](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#filter).
- Coerce class name passed to [selection.classed](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#classed) to a string.
- Restore workaround for Safari [SVGLocatable bug](https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=44083), still present in iOS 7 after 4+ years.
- Add support for [spm](http://spmjs.io).

- Fix d3.layout.tree RangeError (maximum call stack size exceeded) on particularly deep trees.
- Fix d3.behavior.zoom bug with multiple touchstart targets.

- Fix parsing of time zone offset (%Z).
- Fix d3.scale.quantile to ignore null values in the domain.
- Optimize d3.mean.

- Optimize d3.interpolateString, especially with many shared numbers. (Thank you, @ChALkeR!)
- Avoid spurious closePath ("Z") commands during geographic clipping.

- [d3.scale.linear](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#linear_tickFormat) computes a consistent [SI-prefix and precision](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/9764126) when the "s" tick format is used.
- [d3.bisector](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#d3_bisector) may take a comparator (in addition to an accessor as before).
- [d3.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#d3_interpolate) prefers interpolateNumber when non-array objects (e.g., Date) are coercible to numbers.
- [transition.delay](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#delay) and [transition.duration](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#duration) may be called in getter mode.
- Faster parsing of [hexadecimal colors](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#d3_rgb) contributed by @voidstardb.
- Add [d3.touch](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#d3_touch) for getting the location of a single touch.
- Fix bug in [d3.behavior.drag](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Drag-Behavior): when one touch in a [multitouch](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/9669633) ends, other touches may continue.
- Fix bug in [d3.behavior.drag](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Drag-Behavior) and [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) when touchstart target is removed.
- Fix bug in [d3.geo.conicConformal](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#conicConformal) for points antipodal to the conic origin.
- Fix bug in [d3.formatPrefix](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Formatting#d3_formatPrefix): SI-prefixes are consistent for small & large numbers.
- Fix bug in [d3.scale.ordinal](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Ordinal-Scales) with a singleton domain, a discrete range and an unknown input value.
- Fix bug in [d3.svg.axis](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Axes) where the DOM order of tick elements did not match the display.
- Fix bug in [d3.time.scale](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Scales) for subsecond tick generation.
- Remove workaround for three-year old WebKit bug in [d3.mouse](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#d3_mouse).
- Remove workaround for old Sizzle sorting bug.
- New locales available for ca-ES, en-GB, pt-BR, and zh-CN.
- Avoid [asymmetric behavior](https://code.google.com/p/v8/issues/detail?id=3006) of Math.sin and Math.cos in Chrome 33 in d3.geo.area and d3.geo.path.
- Fix missing currency symbol when formatting currencies using SI-prefix notation in a locale with a currency suffix (e.g., Russian).
- Fix winding order bug in projection.clipExtent (e.g., [Mercator projection](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/3757132); since 3.4.0).

name: 3.4 “Geneva”
body:
- Add [d3.locale](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Localization) for creating new localized number and time formats.
- Add [force.chargeDistance](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Force-Layout#wiki-chargeDistance) for limiting the effect of charge forces.
- Add [timeFormat.multi](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Formatting#wiki-format_multi) for multi-resolution time formats.
- Add [size](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-set_size) and [empty](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-set_empty) methods to d3.map and d3.set.
- Faster implementation of [d3.geom.hull](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Hull-Geom) contributed by @DanGoldbach.
- Built-in support for [AMD / RequireJS](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki#wiki-installing).
- Fix crash in [scale.nice](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Scales#wiki-nice) when a time scale has a sub-second domain.

- Fix antimeridian cutting for the [transverse Mercator projection](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4695821).
- Fix [selection.classed](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-classed) when the specified class names are empty.
- Fix [d3.random.irwinHall](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Math#wiki-d3_random_irwinHall), which was actually returning a [Bates distribution](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/3048450). The latter is now available as [d3.random.bates](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Math#wiki-d3_random_bates).
- Fix DSV parsing (d3.tsv, d3.csv) with cross-domain requests in IE9.

- Fix rendering instability in adaptive resampling when points lie on the antimeridian.
- Fix axis rendering when switching between ordinal and quantitative scales.
- Pass the group index _j_ to the filter function in selection.filter and transition.filter.

- Improve performance of d3.geo.projection when adaptive resampling is disabled.
- Improve performance of drag gestures on browsers that support selectstart events.
- Fix automatic precision of scale.tickFormat when using significant digits.

- Fix catastrophic loss of precision when computing Voronoi tessellation.
- Fix Voronoi tessellation when cell does not intersect the clip extent.
- Fix stale children array when recomputing a hierarchical layout.

- Improve transition performance by deferring the first tick until after all tweens are initialized.
- Faster d3.geom.voronoi based on [Raymond Hill’s implementation](https://github.com/gorhill/Javascript-Voronoi).
- Fix crash when appending into a document different than the one in which D3 was loaded.
- Fix crash in enter.insert in IE9.
- Optimize d3.merge.

- Improve accuracy of winding order determination in d3.geo.projection.
- Fix spherical clipping for complex polygons.
- Fix [viewport clipping](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-clipExtent) when a subject polygon completely surrounds the viewport.
- Fix zero-duration transitions to always tick once at _t_ = 1 (and never _t_ = 0).
- Fix d3.svg.axis to not pollute an ordinal scale’s domain when an explicit range is used.
- Minor optimizations.
- Ordinal scales no longer implicitly extend the domain with rangeBands or rangePoints.

- Fix bug in winding order determination in d3.geo.projection.
- Fix bug in tick key function (e.g., subsecond ticks) in d3.svg.axis.
- Fix crash in tick generation when a d3.time.scale’s domain is empty.

- Fix [d3.mouse](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-d3_mouse) for touch events with no touches (such as touchend).
- Fix [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) when a secondary touch is started outside the zoomable element.
- Support parsing time zone offsets (%Z) in [d3.time.format](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Formatting).
- Fixes crash in d3.transition on IE9 due to lack of ​_​_​​proto​_​_ support.

- Fix obsolete “major” class being inadvertently applied to axis ticks.
- Fix floating point precision bug in d3.geo.circle causing an occasional coincident endpoint.
- Fix d3.time.format parse to ignore optional padding specifiers (e.g., “%-d”).

name: 3.3 “Haleakalā”
body:
- Add [selection.interrupt](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-interrupt) for immediately interrupting the current transition.
- Add [brush.event](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Controls#wiki-brush_event) for programmatic brushing, including transitions (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6232537) [2](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6216724)).
- Add [zoom.event](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior#wiki-event) for programmatic zooming, including transitions (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6238040) [2](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6242308) [3](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6252418) [4](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6262722) [5](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6287633)).
- Add [d3.interpolateZoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateZoom) for smooth zooming based on van Wijk & Nuij (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6301817) [2](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6301872)).
- Add [zoom.center](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior#wiki-center) to control over focal point while mousewheel zooming (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6226534)).
- Add “zoomstart” and “zoomend” events to [zoom.on](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior#wiki-on).
- Add [d3.geo.transform](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Streams#wiki-transform) to simplify creating custom geometry transforms (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6216797) [2](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/5663666)).
- Add [d3.geo.clipExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Streams#wiki-clipExtent) for viewport clipping with custom transforms (e.g., [1](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6287633)).
- Allow [d3.geo.stream](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Streams) to stream three-dimensional coordinates; useful for [dynamic simplification](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6245977).
- Add “beforesend” event to [xhr.on](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Requests#wiki-on) to manipulate the request before sending.
- Add [axis.innerTickSize](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Axes#wiki-innerTickSize) and [axis.outerTickSize](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Axes#wiki-outerTickSize); deprecates multi-argument [axis.tickSize](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Axes#wiki-tickSize).
- Add [d3.pairs](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_pairs) for constructing tuples of adjacent elements.
- On quantitative scales, including time scales, [`scale.ticks()`](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-linear_ticks) is now equivalent to `scale.ticks(10)`.
- On quantitative scales, including time scales, [`scale.nice()`](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-linear_nice) is now equivalent to `scale.nice(10)`.
- On time scales, [`scale.nice(count)`](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Scales#wiki-nice) and `scale.nice(interval, skip)` are now supported.
- On time scales, [`scale.ticks(interval)`](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Scales#wiki-nice) is now favored over `scale.ticks(range)`.
- Fix transition [“end” events](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-each) such that they are fired before transition cleanup, for [easier chaining](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/6242308).
- Fix transition submillisecond timing to improve synchronization of [long-running transition chains](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/1125997).
- Fix subpixel-precision [brush extent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Controls#wiki-brush_extent) when set programmatically.
- Disable [axis.tickSubdivide](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Axes); use [post-selection and multiple axes](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4349486) instead.
- Disable webkit-tap-highlight-color when using the brush.
- Escape non-ascii character in d3.v3.min.js.

- Fix multitouch handling in [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) and drag-based interaction.
- Fix [d3.map](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_map) copy constructor for objects that implement [array.forEach](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/forEach).
- Fix crash in [selection.sort](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-sort) when the selection has multiple null nodes.
- Fix crash in [tick generation](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log_ticks) for [d3.scale.log](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log) with invalid domains that span zero.
- Several micro-optimizations.

- Color [interpolators](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateRgb) (and by extension, [quantitative scales](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales)) once again return strings rather than [color instances](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors), improving performance and lessening surprise. (Partially reverts [3.2.4](v3.2.4).)
- Fix [transition chaining](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-transition) such that earlier transitions are guaranteed to end normally (emitting [end events](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-each)) before later transitions start.
- Fix crash in [transition.filter](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-filter) with empty transitions.
- Fix [zoom behavior](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) on devices that support touch and mouse events simultaneously.

### Enter and Update

The **enter-update** pattern has been simplified: the [enter](Selections#wiki-wiki-enter) selection now merges into the [update](Selections#wiki-wiki-data) selection when you append or insert. This new approach reduces code duplication between enter and update. Rather than applying operators to both the enter and update selection separately, you can now apply them to the update selection after entering the nodes.

For example, say you had a selection of circles and wanted to update their radii. Previously you had to call the [attr](Selections#wiki-wiki-attr) operator twice, once for enter and once for update:

``` javascript
var circle = svg.selectAll("circle").data([data]);
circle.exit().remove();
circle.enter().append("svg:circle").attr("r", radius); // for enter
circle.attr("r", radius); // for update
```

In addition, if you wanted _circle_ to refer to all the on-screen nodes (enter ∪ update) subsequently, you'd have to reselect as well to merge the enter and update selections:

``` javascript
circle = svg.selectAll("circle"); // reselect
```

In 2.0.0, you can eliminate this duplicate code because entering nodes will add them to _both_ the enter selection and the update selection simultaneously. Running operators on the update selection after enter will thus apply to both entering and updating nodes:

``` javascript
var circle = svg.selectAll("circle").data([data]);
circle.exit().remove();
circle.enter().append("svg:circle"); // adds enter to update
circle.attr("r", radius); // for enter and update
```

Note: in the rare case that you want to run operators only on the updating nodes, you can run them on the update selection before entering new nodes. If you want to run operators only on the entering nodes, you can still do that (as before) by applying them to the enter selection.

### Selector Functions

The [select](Selections#wiki-wiki-select) and [selectAll](Selections#wiki-wiki-selectAll) operators can now take **selector functions**, in addition to selector strings such as "#id" and ".class". For example, if you want to select the first child of every element, you can now say:

``` javascript
var children = g.select(function() { return this.firstChild; });
```

This also means that selection can dynamically create new elements, or reorder existing elements by re-inserting them into the DOM. This is an advanced feature, but you might find it useful for extending D3. For example, you could use XPath rather than selectors if you wanted.

### Transparent Transitions

Transitions are now **transparent** arrays of elements, and you can inspect them in the developer console just like selections. Each selected element is wrapped in an object that stores the delay and duration of the associated transition. (Recall that these values are computed on a per-element basis for staggered animations.) Internally, some of the timing logic that manages transitions has also been simplified, improving performance and fixing a few timing bugs.

The [each](Transitions#wiki-wiki-each) operator can now be called with one argument (a callback function), offering compatibility with the selection's [each](Selections#wiki-wiki-each) operator. Transitions now expose an [id](Transitions#wiki-wiki-id) property, which can be useful for debugging concurrent transitions; this identifier is inherited by subtransitions, fixing a bug with nested transitions.

**Sequenced** transitions are now also easier to implement, thanks to the transition's [transition](Transitions#wiki-transition) operator, which returns a copy of the current transition. The copy inherits the delay, duration, id and easing of the original transition. You can then modify the delay to sequence multiple transitions, without needing to listen for the "end" event. For example, here's how you would enter a circle, and then remove it after a couple seconds:

``` javascript
svg.append("svg:circle")
    .attr("r", 1e-6)
  .transition()
    .ease(Math.sqrt)
    .attr("r", 4.5)
  .transition()
    .delay(2000)
    .attr("r", 1e-6)
    .remove();
```

You can also use this technique to use different easing functions for different tweens! For example, you could use "cubic-in-out" easing for position properties, and "linear" for color.

### Custom Tweens

A new, generic [tween](Transitions#wiki-wiki-tween) operator has been added, which is used internally by the other tweens (`style`, `attr`, _etc._). You can use this operator directly if you want to define a custom tween as part of the transition; use this instead of listening for a transition "tick" event. For example, the `text` operator does not interpolate by default, but you can now interpolate text content by saying:

``` javascript
selection.transition().tween("text", function() {
  var i = d3.interpolate(this.textContent, "yellow");
  return function(t) {
    this.textContent = i(t);
  };
});
```

You might want to write your tweens as reusable functions (say, closures) rather than the above example which hard-codes the transition to "yellow". See the built-in attr and style tweens for inspiration.

### Axes

A new **axis** component has been added to the [d3.svg](SVG-Shapes) module. The axis component makes it easy to add reference lines, ticks and labels to any visualization. This display of the axes is highly customizable, and best of all, the axes support smooth transitions automatically. See this [quick demo](http://bl.ocks.org/1166403) of axes used by an area chart. More documentation and examples for this component will be coming in the next few days.

### Extending and Overriding

Selection and transition are now defined using [prototype injection](http://perfectionkills.com/how-ecmascript-5-still-does-not-allow-to-subclass-an-array/) rather than direct extension. This improves performance and reduces memory overhead, as the majority of methods are now defined on a prototype rather than on each instance. Also, this makes the code cleaner as each operator is fully separable and defined in its own source file. This fixed a few bugs, such as the missing [empty](Selections#wiki-wiki-empty) operator on enter selections.

Prototype injection also means that selections and transitions can be extended and customized! You can now override the behavior of D3's core operators, or add your own. This may be particularly useful to provide compatibility with nonstandard browsers, or proprietary document object models. You can also use JavaScript's `instanceof` operator to see whether an object is a `d3.selection` or `d3.transition`.

### Tests

D3 now has an extensive test suite built with [Vows](http://vowsjs.org). As of the 2.0.0 release, we have 1,200+ tests and 90% coverage of the core library. More tests are under development. The tests are written to verify the behavior of each of D3's operators, and may be interesting to explore if you have questions about how D3 works, complementing the API reference.

- Subtransitions (transition.transition).
- Great circles.

- Equirectangular projection.
- Variable-strength charge for force layouts.

- Azimuthal and Bonne projections.
- Great arcs and great circle clipping.
- Variable log ticks.

- SI-prefix ("r") format.
- Multiple classes for the classed operator.
- Mean and median.

- Add d3.svg.brush.
- 2D transform transitions.
- Namespaced events for d3.dispatch.
- Extended ISO 8601.
- Extents for zoom behavior.
- Array extents.

- Namespaces for selection.append and selection.insert now optional (in most cases)!
- Ordinal scale support for axes and brushes.
- Drag behavior supports configurable origin.
- Dispatchers can be used to access current listeners.

- The selection.filter method can now take a selector, such as filter(".foo").
- Add selection.order: reorders document elements to match selection order; this is faster than selection.sort if your data is already in-order.

- Add selection.datum (deprecating selection.map), which is like selection.data but doesn't compute a data-join; it can be used to get or set the data bound to elements.
- Brush component can now take decorative resizers.
- Add d3.map class (similar to ES6's map collection) for easier management of string-value maps; this is used internally by transitions, event listeners, the nest operator, and many other components.
- Add d3.bisector for bisecting sorted arrays with an accessor.
- Expose d3.selection.enter.prototype.
- Generalize d3.svg.mouse to support HTML elements, and renamed to d3.mouse.
- Add d3.scale.identity.
- Add axis.tickValues.
- Rewrite d3.behavior.zoom.
- Add "start" and "end" events to force layout, along with force.tick and force.alpha for synchronous execution.
- Add a variety of new time interval methods.
- Add `defined` methods to d3.svg.line and d3.svg.area.

- Add [multi-valued map](http://bl.ocks.org/3305515) support for selection.attr and similar methods.
- Add [L*a*b* and HCL](http://bl.ocks.org/3014589) color spaces.
- Add [d3.tween](http://bl.ocks.org/3305854) for easier customization of transition interpolators.
- Add [d3.tsv](http://bl.ocks.org/3305937) for loading tab-separated values.
- Add static [localization for d3.time.format](http://bl.ocks.org/3306234), including fr_FR and ru_RU locales.
- Add a new quantitative scale: [d3.scale.threshold](http://bl.ocks.org/3306362).
- Add [outer padding](http://bl.ocks.org/3310560) support for d3.scale.ordinal’s rangeBands.
- Add [d3.layout.pack padding](http://bl.ocks.org/3007180) support.
- [Custom interpolators](http://bl.ocks.org/3310323) can now be used with d3.svg.line and d3.svg.area.
- Add new random generators for [log-normal](http://bl.ocks.org/3048166) and [Irwin–Hall](http://bl.ocks.org/3048450) distributions.
- Improve [d3.time.scale’s nice](http://bl.ocks.org/3306147).
- Fix incorrect tangents with [monotone interpolation](http://bl.ocks.org/3310233).
- Simplify [transform interpolation](http://bl.ocks.org/3173784).
- Fix greatArc.target when the specified target is a constant. (Note: greatArc was deprecated in [3.1.0](v3.1.0).)

- Fix [selection.data](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-data) when duplicate keys are specified; only the first datum or element is considered and subsequent data or elements are ignored.
- Allow [projection](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-_projection) to return null if the specified location is clipped.
- Fix localization when building on Linux.

- Fix [circle.origin](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-circle_origin).
- Fix [path.bounds](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-path_bounds) for projections that do not implement [projection.stream](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-stream).

- Fix [treemap.mode](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Treemap-Layout#wiki-mode) "slice-dice".
- Fix [d3.geo.centroid](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-centroid) for mixed geometry types.
- Fix [d3.geo.stream](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Streams) for nested GeometryCollections.
- Update [JSDOM](https://github.com/tmpvar/jsdom) dependency (when using D3 within Node), and remove [Sizzle](http://sizzlejs.com/) dependency.

- Fix [d3.svg.axis](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Axes) such that: the “tick” class is applied to the g element, rather than the line; the domain path is properly entered when called via transition; and an invalid orientation is treated as "bottom".
- Fix [selection.sort](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-sort) such that null nodes are placed at the end, rather than passing undefined to the comparator.
- Fix [force.linkDistance](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Force-Layout#wiki-linkDistance) and [force.linkStrength](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Force-Layout#wiki-linkStrength) such that they return a constant value if the link distance or strength is specified as a constant value, rather than returning a function; fix [force.drag](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Force-Layout#wiki-drag) such that a [drag behavior](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Drag-Behavior) is properly instantiated when called with no arguments, and any additional set `fixed` bits are preserved on mouseup or mouseout.
- Fix [d3.geom.voronoi](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Voronoi-Geom) to workaround Prototype’s broken implementation of array.filter.
- Fix [d3.format](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Formatting) and [d3.formatPrefix](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Formatting#wiki-d3_formatPrefix) to use MICRO SIGN (µ) rather than GREEK SMALL LETTER MU (μ), and fix the rounding specifiers "p" and "r".
- Fix [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior)’s detection of wheel event support, and increase speed for browsers that do not support wheel events.
- Optimize [d3.random.logNormal](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Math#wiki-d3_random_logNormal).
- Optimize [d3.geo.area](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-area).
- Capture references to the `d3` namespace, the current document and the current window, rather than rely on globals; allows multiple versions of D3 to be loaded independently.

- Fix [d3.geo.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-interpolate) for coincident points.
- Improve accuracy of [d3.geo.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-interpolate) for small distances using the [haversine formula](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haversine_formula).
- Fix polygon rendering when using [projection.clipAngle](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-clipAngle) or [projection.clipExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-clipExtent) and multiple points are coincident with the clip boundary.
- Fix [d3.rebind](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Internals#wiki-rebind) such that it returns the target object if the rebound source method returns the source object, rather than checking argument length.
- Fix [d3.time.format.iso](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Formatting#wiki-format_iso) for Safari 5.

- Fix [projection.clipExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-clipExtent) for very large coordinates (e.g., [satellite projection](http://www.jasondavies.com/maps/satellite/)).
- Fix regression in [d3.geom.quadtree](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quadtree-Geom) introduced in [3.1.0](v3.1.0).
- Fix [d3.geo.mercator](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-mercator) such that the clip extent is determined automatically by default.
- Fix [projection.clipExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-clipExtent) to remove the redundant closing point when no clipping is performed.

- Fix click suppression following a [zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) or [drag](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Drag-Behavior).
- Fix [d3.geo.stream](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Streams) for null geometries.
- Fix [d3.interpolateNumber](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateNumber) and [d3.interpolateString](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateString) to always coerce input values to the appropriate type.
- Fix [d3.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolate) such that objects that are coercible to numbers (such as `[0]`) are still interpolated using [d3.interpolateArray](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateArray) or [d3.interpolateObject](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateObject) as appropriate.

- Allow hue, chroma or saturation to be undefined in [d3.hsl](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#wiki-d3_hsl) and [d3.hcl](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#wiki-d3_hcl).
- When one of the two color’s hue, chroma or saturation is undefined in [d3.interpolateHsl](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateHsl) or [d3.interpolateHcl](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateHcl), use the other color’s value. For example, when interpolating from black to blue in HCL, the intermediate colors are now dark blues (#241178) rather than dark purples (#600054).
- Fix [d3.selection](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-d3_selection) and [d3.transition](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_transition) to select the document element rather than the document.
- Fix [d3.select](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-d3_select) to not propagate data bound to the document element (if any).
- Fix [d3.select](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-d3_select) and [d3.selectAll](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-d3_selectAll) such that the parent node is the document element.
- Fix [d3.geom.hull](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Hull-Geom) such that the returned polygon is counterclockwise, consistent with [polygon.clip](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Polygon-Geom#wiki-clip).

- Fix [pow](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-pow), [sqrt](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-sqrt) and [log](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log) scales to preserve set domains exactly.
- Fix [d3.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolate) when start and end values are different types; an interpolator is now chosen solely based on the end value. For example, when interpolating from the empty string to a number, [d3.interpolateNumber](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateNumber) is now used instead of [d3.interpolateString](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateString), producing the desired intermediate interpolation from zero.
- Fix [d3.interpolateString](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateString) such that the return value is always a string, even if both the start and end value are coercible to numbers.
- Fix [d3.interpolateTransform](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateTransform) and [d3.transform](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Math#wiki-transform) for the identity transform in Firefox.
- Fix regression in [projection.clipExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-clipExtent).
- Improve [d3.geo.bounds](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-bounds) implementation to handle [inflection points and the antimeridian](http://www.jasondavies.com/maps/bounds/).

- Redesign [d3.geo.albersUsa](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-albersUsa). Adopted more standard projections for the  [contiguous United States](http://spatialreference.org/ref/esri/102003/), [Alaska](http://spatialreference.org/ref/epsg/3338/) and [Hawaii](http://spatialreference.org/ref/esri/102007/), and removed Puerto Rico. Now applies clipping, enabling the use of graticules and robust inversion. Note: the projection will now return null when applied to points outside of the visible area. (If you require a similar projection that includes Puerto Rico, see [this example](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/5629120).)
- Change default settings of [d3.geo.albers](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-albers) to match the new albersUsa projection.
- Optimize [d3.geo.path](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths) rendering by caching projection streams.
- ~~Define [ordinal.rangeBand](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Ordinal-Scales#wiki-rangeBand) when [ordinal.rangePoints](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Ordinal-Scales#wiki-rangePoints) is used.~~ Reverted in [3.1.9](v3.1.9).
- Revert change to [ordinal.rangeBand](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Ordinal-Scales#wiki-ordinal_rangeBand) introduced in [3.1.8](v3.1.8).
- Fix bug in [log.nice](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log_nice) introduced in [3.2.5](v3.2.5).

- Fix bug with localized decimal point in [d3.format](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Formatting).
- Fix default behavior suppression for drag gestures (e.g., [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior)) on touch devices.
- Suppress double-tap default behavior with [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) on touch devices.
- Improve floating point precision for [log.ticks](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log_ticks) and [log.nice](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log_nice).
- Include minified JavaScript for use with [Bower](http://bower.io/).

- Fix [xhr.response](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Requests#wiki-response) such that if the function errors, it is reported as an error rather than crashing. For example, if [d3.json](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Requests#wiki-d3_json) attempts to parse invalid JSON, the callback is now invoked with a ParseError.
- Fix IE9 race condition when a synchronous error invokes [xhr.response](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Requests#wiki-response) before it is set.
- Fix [d3.timer](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_timer) such that timers are called back in the order they are registered. This guarantees that chained transitions are allowed to end before the next transition in the chain starts.
- Fix [d3.timer.flush](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_timer_flush) such that all active timers are ticked once, not just timers with zero delay.
- Optimize timer run loop.

- Add currency support to [d3.format](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Formatting#wiki-d3_format) (e.g., `"+$,.2f"`).
- Add missing [quantile.invertExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-quantile_invertExtent) method.
- Fix [enter.insert](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-insert) to preserve order of entering elements relative to updating elements when no _before_ selector is specified. This provides a more efficient alternative to [selection.order](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-order) in cases where the updating selection is not reordered.
- Fix “basis” [line interpolation](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Shapes#wiki-line_interpolate) for WebKit marker automatic orientation.
- Fix [transition.each](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-each) to inherit transition.time, precisely synchronizing [chained transitions](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/1125997).
- Improve transition performance by lazily constructing "start" and "end" event dispatcher.
- ~~Change [d3.interpolateRgb](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateRgb) and related methods (including [d3.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolate) and [d3.scale.linear](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales)) to return [color instances](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors) (e.g., [d3.rgb](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Colors#wiki-d3_rgb)) rather than hexadecimal strings.~~ Reverted in [3.2.7](v3.2.7).

- Fix [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) for Android.
- Fix [d3.min](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_min), [d3.max](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_max) and [d3.extent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_extent) for objects with non-orderable values (e.g., `new Number(NaN)`).
- Fix [d3.bisect](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_bisect) for non-orderable search value; now returns NaN.
- Fix [d3.scale.threshold](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-threshold) for non-orderable input values; now returns undefined.
- Fix [transition.selectAll](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-selectAll) when the specified function returns null nodes.
- Fix [brush.clamp](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Controls#wiki-brush_clamp) when no scales are yet attached to the brush.

- Add missing [transition.size](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-size) method.
- Augment [adaptive resampling](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-precision) with a 30° angular distance threshold, improving performance.
- Better handling of drag gestures in [d3.behavior.drag](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Drag-Behavior), [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) and [d3.svg.brush](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Controls) by not preventing default behaviors or stopping propagation. For example, mousedown now changes focus, mouseup outside an iframe works correctly, and touchstart does not stutter.

- Allow [pack.radius](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Pack-Layout#wiki-radius) to be specified as a constant.
- Accept a function for [selection.append](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-append) and [selection.insert](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-insert).
- Limit automatic [transform interpolation](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-d3_interpolateTransform) to [transition.attr](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Transitions#wiki-attr).
- Fix [polygon.clip](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Polygon-Geom#wiki-clip) for closed polygons.
- Build fixes for Bower and Component(1).

name: 3.0 “Baja”
body:
The page covers new features in 3.0; see [Upgrading to 3.0](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Upgrading-to-3.0.md) for how to migrate from 2.x to 3.0. - [日本語](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/JP-3.0) ## Geo
Antimeridian Cutting
 Three-Axis Rotation
 Rotating Winkel-Tripel
 Rotating Equirectangular
Clipping
 Adaptive Resampling
 Canvas Rendering
 Satellite & Graticule
Projection Transitions
 Choropleth
 Raster Reprojection
D3 includes a powerful new [geographic projection](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Geo-Projections.md) system! Whereas previous versions of D3 only understood projections as point functions, D3 3.0 models projections as full geometry transformations. Thus, when straight lines are projected to curves, D3 applies configurable [adaptive resampling](http://bl.ocks.org/3795544) to subdivide lines and eliminate projection artifacts; see for example the smooth appearance of Antarctica in the [Larrivée](http://bl.ocks.org/3719042) and [Van der Grinten](http://bl.ocks.org/3796831) projections. When lines or polygons cross the antimeridian, D3 [cuts the geometry](http://bl.ocks.org/3788999), rather than relying on pre-cut shapefiles. All projections now support [small circle](http://bl.ocks.org/3790444) [clipping](http://www.jasondavies.com/maps/clip/) and [three-axis rotation](http://bl.ocks.org/4282586). Under the hood, D3 uses streaming geometry transformations (d3.geo.stream) that reduce memory by avoiding temporary objects. This design also enables [direct-to-canvas rendering](http://bl.ocks.org/4183330) with dramatic performance improvements! Streams are used to compute projected area, centroid and bounds consistent with displayed geometry, and can even filter geometry for [scale-dependent shape simplification](http://bost.ocks.org/mike/simplify/). The d3.geo package includes a number of useful new components, such as a [graticule](http://bl.ocks.org/3664049) for displaying grid lines and sphere rendering for globe outlines. The d3.geo.circle class now supports small and great circle rendering, so you can approximate [Tissot's indicatrix](http://bl.ocks.org/4052873). A new d3.geo.interpolate simplifies interpolation of spherical coordinates along great arcs, and there are even new functions for accurately computing spherical area, centroid and bounds. ### Plugins
Peirce Quincuncial
 Wagner VI
 Equidistant Conic
 Mollweide
Sinu-Mollweide
 Goode Homolosine
 Van der Grinten
 d3.hexbin
d3.geo.tile
 TopoJSON
 Map Coloring
 Smooth Zooming
The extended [geographic projections](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Geo-Projections.md) plugin brings the number of supported projections to over 40! You can also compose new custom projections using d3.geo.projection and d3.geo.projectionMutator. The [d3.geo.tile](http://bl.ocks.org/4150951) plugin makes it easy to drop-in 256x256 raster tiles into your map visualization. In conjunction with d3.behavior.zoom, you can quickly create [slippy maps](http://bl.ocks.org/4132797). The [d3.hexbin](http://bl.ocks.org/4330486) and [d3.interpolateZoom](http://bl.ocks.org/3828981) plugins are also useful for mapping. [TopoJSON](https://github.com/mbostock/topojson) is an extension to GeoJSON that typically provides 80-90% smaller file sizes. It also encodes topology, enabling topology-preserving shape simplification (à la MapShaper), [map coloring](http://bl.ocks.org/4180634), [cartograms](http://prag.ma/code/d3-cartogram/), [boundary mesh computation](http://bl.ocks.org/4090870), and more! TopoJSON is not a D3 plugin per se, but simply a standalone JavaScript library for converting TopoJSON to GeoJSON; a future release of d3.geo may add native TopoJSON support. ## Transitions
Chained Transitions, I
 Chained Transitions, II
 Chained Transitions, III
 Chained Transitions, IV
Transition Reselection, I
 Transition Reselection, II
D3’s transitions now bind tweens and other transition state to the DOM, similar to how data is bound to selections. This means you can now _reselect_ scheduled transitions from the DOM and modify them, say for [customized](http://bl.ocks.org/3885705) [axes](http://bl.ocks.org/4323929). You can also inspect them in the JavaScript console for easier debugging. To make transitions easier to use, value functions are now evaluated immediately by transition.attr and transition.style, rather than waiting until the transition starts. This greatly simplifies [chained transitions](http://bl.ocks.org/3903818) that depend on external state, such as scale domains. The transition.transition method now creates a transition that starts when the previous transition ends (rather than a concurrent transition), so you can [chain transitions](http://bl.ocks.org/3943967) without listening for "end" events. For more on how transitions work in D3, see the [Working with Transitions](http://bost.ocks.org/mike/transition/) tutorial, and the section on transitions in [Upgrading to 3.0](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Upgrading-to-3.0.md). ## Requests
Progress Events
 d3.xhr + Queue.js
D3's asynchronous methods for issuing requests now return a [d3.xhr](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Requests.md#d3_xhr) object. This offers much greater control over the request. You can have multiple listeners, including separate listeners for [progress](http://bl.ocks.org/3750941), load and error events. You can use [xhr.abort](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Requests.md#abort) to cancel in-flight requests, [xhr.header](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Requests.md#header) to add request headers, and [xhr.send](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Requests.md#send) to customize the HTTP method and body data. Also, D3 now begrudgingly provides CORS compatibility for IE9 by way of Microsoft's nonstandard XDomainRequest object. The asynchronous request methods now support the Node.js callback pattern, where the first argument to the callback is the error, and the second argument is the result. This makes d3.xhr compatible with asynchronous JavaScript helper libraries, such as [Queue.js](https://github.com/mbostock/queue), which makes it much easier to load multiple resources in parallel. See the section on requests in [Upgrading to 3.0](https://github.com/d3/d3-3.x-api-reference/blob/master/Upgrading-to-3.0.md) for examples. ## And More In addition to all of the above, D3 includes a handful of bug fixes, performance improvements, and minor new features. A new d3.shuffle method provides the [Fisher–Yates shuffle](http://bost.ocks.org/mike/shuffle/). The d3.format class now supports align and fill, and both d3.format and d3.time.format support [POSIX localization](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Locale) at build time. The d3.layout.treemap now supports the "slice-and-dice" algorithm. Lastly, all of the D3 examples have been moved to [bl.ocks.org](http://bl.ocks.org) and [GitHub Gist](http://gist.github.com) for easier browsing & forking.

name: 3.1 “Svalbard”
body: ## Geo - Major and minor step to [graticule](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-graticule). Default graticule step is now 10°. - Add [d3.geo.distance](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-d3_geo_distance); deprecate d3.geo.greatArc. - Add [d3.geo.length](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-d3_geo_length). - Add [d3.geo.albersUsa](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-albersUsa) invert. - Add [d3.geo.rotation](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-d3_geo_rotation). - Add d3.geo.projection [clipExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-clipExtent) for [viewport clipping](http://www.jasondavies.com/maps/clip-extent/). - Add [d3.geo.transverseMercator](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-transverseMercator). Useful for [state plane projections](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/5126418), for example. - Add [d3.geo.conicConformal](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-conicConformal), [conicEquidistant](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-conicEquidistant), [conicEqualArea](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-conicEqualArea). ### Mercator Projection The [Mercator projection](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-mercator) now uses viewport clipping rather than clamping latitudes. The viewport is automatically determined by the projection’s scale and translate, but can be set explicitly using projection.clipExtent. Note that only d3.geo.mercator uses viewport clipping; d3.geo.mercator.raw does no clipping or clamping. D3 3.1 changes the scale of [d3.geo.mercator](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Projections#wiki-mercator), increasing the effective scale factor by 2π. When upgrading to 3.1, divide your previous scale by 2π when setting, or multiply by 2π when getting. See the [d3.geo.tile example](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/4150951) for sample usage. ## Selections - Add selection.on("mouseenter") and selection.on("mouseleave") polyfill; see [mouseenter vs. mouseover example](http://bl.ocks.org/mbostock/5247027). - Add [selection.on(".name", null)](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-on). - Add selection.insert(name, function). - Fix for [selection.classed](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-classed) in Safari 5. ## Scales and Data - Allow row conversion for [d3.csv.parse](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/CSV#wiki-parse) and d3.tsv.parse. - Add [d3.csv.format](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/CSV#wiki-format) and d3.tsv.format. - Add [d3.set](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_set). - Allow [d3.map](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_map) to be used with [d3.nest](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Arrays#wiki-d3_nest). - Add [d3.scale.log](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log) [base](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log_base). - Add optional format specifier for d3.scale.{linear,pow,sqrt,identity} [tickFormat](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-linear_tickFormat). ## Geometry - Add accessors for d3.geom.{[voronoi](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Voronoi-Geom),[quadtree](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quadtree-Geom),[hull](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Hull-Geom)}. - Add [d3.geom.voronoi](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Voronoi-Geom#wiki-voronoi) links, triangles; deprecate [d3.geom.delaunay](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Voronoi-Geom#wiki-delaunay). ## And one more thing… Thanks to [SMASH](https://github.com/mbostock/smash), you can now build a minimal version of D3 that has just the parts you need, reducing the size of your JavaScript assets. For example, if you need d3.geo.mercator and d3.geo.path to render some stuff to Canvas, you could build a minimal bundle that’s only 24K: ``` bash smash src/start.js src/geo/path.js src/geo/mercator.js src/end.js > lib.js ``` See the [SMASH wiki](https://github.com/mbostock/smash/wiki) for a more detailed example including an example Makefile.

name: 3.2 “Point Lobos”
body:
- Add [d3.dsv](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/CSV#wiki-dsv) to support generic delimiter-separated values (e.g., "|") beyond TSV & CSV.
- Add [selection.size](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-size) to count the number of selected elements.
- Add [xhr.responseType](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Requests#wiki-responseType).
- Add [quadtree.extent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quadtree-Geom#wiki-extent); deprecates size.
- Add [voronoi.clipExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Voronoi-Geom#wiki-clipExtent); deprecates size.
- Add [tree.nodeSize](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Tree-Layout#wiki-nodeSize) and [cluster.nodeSize](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Cluster-Layout#wiki-nodeSize) for fixed-size nodes.
- Add [pack.radius](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Pack-Layout#wiki-radius) for explicit control of circle radius.
- Add _count_ argument to [linear.nice](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-linear_nice) and [pow.nice](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-pow_nice) to control nicing precision.
- Add [threshold.invertExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-threshold_invertExtent) and [quantize.invertExtent](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-quantize_invertExtent).
- Add "step" to [line.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Shapes#wiki-line_interpolate) and [area.interpolate](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Shapes#wiki-area_interpolate).
- Add [brush.clamp](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/SVG-Controls#wiki-brush_clamp) to control extent clamping.
- Add support for parsing day-of-year, week-of-year, etc. in [d3.time.format](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Formatting).
- Add missing [selection.call](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-enter) on enter selections.
- d3.xhr now prefers XMLHttpRequest to XDomainRequest for cross-origin requests, if supported (IE10).
- More accurate [d3.geo.area](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-d3_geo_area) implementation.
- Improve [d3.geo.centroid](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths#wiki-d3_geo_centroid); now supports area-weighted polygon centroids, zero-extent features and improved handling of ambiguous centroids.
- Improve accuracy of geographic clipping and detection of polygon winding order.
- Improve accuracy of geographic adaptive resampling by enforcing a linear minimum sampling distance.
- Improve performance of [d3.geo.path](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Geo-Paths) by caching projection streams.
- Fix [d3.mouse](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Selections#wiki-d3_mouse) when stylesheets apply padding, margin or borders to all SVG elements.
- Fix [d3.behavior.zoom](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Zoom-Behavior) and [d3.behavior.drag](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Drag-Behavior) in regards to canceling mousedown. Zooming and dragging now play nicely with iframes on [bl.ocks.org](http://bl.ocks.org)!
- Fix [d3.geom.voronoi](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Voronoi-Geom) with custom accessors.
- Fix [d3.layout.pack](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Pack-Layout) with small-radius circles.
- Fix [log.tickFormat](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Quantitative-Scales#wiki-log_tickFormat); now accepts a string as the _format_ argument.
- Fix [time intervals](https://github.com/mbostock/d3/wiki/Time-Intervals) in Firefox when using British Summer Time.
